VAMPIRICA.name: Bloody Tear
VAMPIRICA.description: Evolved Whip. Can deal critical damage and absorb HP.

HOLY_MISSILE.name: Holy Wand
HOLY_MISSILE.description: Evolved Magic Wand. Fires with no delay.

KNIFE.name: Knife
KNIFE.description: Fires quickly in the faced direction.

THOUSAND.name: Thousand Edge
THOUSAND.description: Evolved Knife. Fires with no delay.

CROSS.name: Cross
CROSS.description: Aims at nearest enemy, has boomerang effect.

HEAVENSWORD.name: Heaven Sword
HEAVENSWORD.description: Evolved Cross. Can deal critical damage.

FIREBALL.name: Fire Wand
FIREBALL.description: Fires at a random enemy, deals heavy damage.

HELLFIRE.name: Hellfire
HELLFIRE.description: Evolved Fire Wand. Passes through enemies.

GARLIC.name: Garlic
GARLIC.description: Damages nearby enemies. Reduces resistance to knockback and freeze.

VORTEX.name: Soul Eater
VORTEX.description: Evolved Garlic. Steals hearts. Power increases when recovering HP.

BORA.name: La Borra
BORA.description: Evolved Santa Water. Damaging zones follow you and grow when they move.

ROCHER.name: NO FUTURE
ROCHER.description: Evolved Runetracer. Explodes when bouncing and in retaliation.

LOOP.name: Thunder Loop
LOOP.description: Evolved Lightning Ring. Projectiles strike twice.

PENTAGRAM.name: Pentagram
PENTAGRAM.tips: Best with: Cooldown and Luck only.

SIRE.name: Gorgeous Moon
SIRE.description: Evolved Pentagram. Generates extra gems and gathers all of them.

SILF3.name: Vandalier
SILF3.description: Union of Ebony Wings and Peachone.

GUNS.name: Phiera Der Tuphello
GUNS.description: Fires quickly in four fixed directions.

GUNS2.name: Eight The Sparrow
GUNS2.description: Fires quickly in four fixed directions.

GUNS3.name: Phieraggi
GUNS3.description: Union of Phiera Der Tuphello and Eight The Sparrow. Scales with Revivals.

GATTI.name: Gatti Amari
GATTI.description: Summons capricious projectiles. Might interact with pickups.

STIGRANGATTI.name: Vicious Hunger
STIGRANGATTI.description: Evolved Gatti Amari. Might turn anything into gold.

MANNAGGIA.name: Mannajja
MANNAGGIA.description: Evolved Song of Mana. Might slow enemies down.

TRAPANO.name: Shadow Pinion
TRAPANO.description: Generates damaging zones when moving, strikes when stopping.

TRAPANO2.name: Valkyrie Turner
TRAPANO2.description: Evolved Shadow Pinion. Bigger, longer, faster, stronger.

LANCET.name: Clock Lancet
LANCET.description: Chance to freeze enemies in time.

CORRIDOR.name: Infinite Corridor
CORRIDOR.description: Evolved Clock Lancet. Halves enemies' health.

SHROUD.name: Crimson Shroud
SHROUD.description: Evolved Laurel. Caps incoming Damage at 10. Retaliates when losing charges.

VENTO.name: Vento Sacro
VENTO.description: Stronger with continuous movement. Can deal critical damage.

VENTO2.name: Fuwalafuwaloo
VENTO2.description: Union of Vento Sacro and Bloody Tear. Critical hits might generate explosions.

BONE2.name: Anima of Mortaccio
BONE2.description: Evolved Bone. Projectiles accelerate when bouncing.

CHERRY.name: Cherry Bomb
CHERRY.description: Throws a bouncing projectile. Explodes, sometimes.

CHERRY2.name: Yatta Daikarin
CHERRY2.description: Evolved Cherry Bomb. Generates extra explosions that can deal critical Luck-based damage.

CART2.name: Carréllo
CART2.description: Throws a bouncing projectile. Number of bounces affected by Amount.

FLOWER.name: Celestial Dusting
FLOWER.description: Throws a bouncing projectile. Cooldown reduces when moving.

FLOWER2.name: Profusione D'Amore
FLOWER2.description: Evolved Celestial Dusting. Projectiles generate a chain explosion at fixed intervals.

JUBILEE.name: Greatest Jubilee
JUBILEE.description: Has a chance to summon light sources.

TRIASSO1.name: Bracelet
TRIASSO1.description: Fires three projectiles at a random enemy.

TRIASSO2.name: Bi-Bracelet
TRIASSO2.description: Fires three projectiles at a random enemy.

TRIASSO3.name: Tri-Bracelet
TRIASSO3.description: Fires three projectiles at a random enemy.

CANDYBOX.name: Candybox
CANDYBOX.description: Allows you to choose any unlocked base weapon.
CANDYBOX.tips: Occurrence in level up options affected by Luck.

CANDYBOX2.name: Super Candybox II Turbo
CANDYBOX2.description: Gift of Candybox. Allows to choose among a selection of advanced weapons.

BATTILIA.name: Pako Battilia
BATTILIA.description: May fire additional times when losing health.

BATTILIA2.name: Mazzo Familiar
BATTILIA2.description: Evolved Pako Battilia. Damage and Amount affected by Max Health.

EX_AMMO1.name: Ammo Appalate
EX_AMMO1.description: Fires towards a random enemy in the faced direction.

EX_AMMO2.name: Gunastrophe
EX_AMMO2.description: Evolved Ammo Appalate. Fires all the guns across the screen.

VICTORY.name: Victory Sword
VICTORY.description: Strikes with a combo attack at the nearest enemy. Retaliates.
VICTORY.customDescValue: Enables critical hits and combo finisher.

SOLES.name: Sole Solution
SOLES.description: Gift of Victory Sword. The more enemies are defeated, the stronger it grows.
SOLES.tips: Requires Max: Victory Sword, Torrona's Box.

MISSPELL2.name: Ashes of Muspell
MISSPELL2.description: Evolved Flames of Misspell. The more enemies are defeated, the stronger it grows.

ICELANCE.name: Glass Fandango
ICELANCE.description: Stronger with movement, Orologions, and against frozen enemies.

ICELANCE2.name: Celestial Voulge
ICELANCE2.description: Evolved Glass Fandango. Might deal critical damage and freeze enemies. Turns Orologions into Starry Heavens.

SANTAJAVELIN.name: Santa Javelin
SANTAJAVELIN.description: Duration affects Amount. Can deal critical damage.

SANTAJAVELIN2.name: Seraphic Cry
SANTAJAVELIN2.description: Evolved Santa Javelin. Critical damage affected by Luck. Turns Rosaries into Weird Souls Purifiers.

EX_GAEA2.name: Embrace of Gaea
EX_GAEA2.description: Evolved Gaze of Gaea. Retaliates. Damage is increased while invulnerable.

EX_MAGISTONE1.name: Magi-Stones
EX_MAGISTONE1.description: Deals damage based on its Weapon Level.

EX_MAGISTONE2.name: Kyra-Stones
EX_MAGISTONE2.description: Evolved Magistone. Damage based on Player Level. Amount increases with enemies.

PHASER.name: Phas3r
PHASER.description: Generates thin damaging zones. Has high Amount scaling.

PHASER2.name: Photonstorm
PHASER2.description: Evolved Phas3r. May fire 2 to 10 times more projectiles depending on Luck.

ARMADIO.name: Arma Dio
ARMADIO.description: Allows you to choose any passive weapon.
ARMADIO.tips: Appearance in level up options affected by Luck.

ARMOR.name: Armor
ARMOR.description: Reduces incoming Damage by 1. Increases retaliatory Damage by 10%.

DURATION.name: Spellbinder
DURATION.description: Increases duration of weapon effects by 10%.

MAGNET.name: Attractorb
MAGNET.description: Character picks up items from further away.

CURSE.name: Skull O'Maniac
CURSE.description: Increases enemy speed, health, quantity, and frequency by 10%.

PANDORA.name: Torrona's Box
PANDORA.description: Cursed item, but increases Might, Projectile Speed, Duration, and Area by 4%.
PANDORA.override: Cursed item, but increases Might, Projectile Speed, Duration, and Area by 4%.
PANDORA.customOverrideValue: Cursed item, but increases Might, Projectile Speed, Duration, and Area by %0%

PARMA.name: Parm Aegis
PARMA.description: Increases invulnerability time after getting damaged by 50ms.

DOMINION.name: Karoma's Mana
DOMINION.description: Increases enemies spawn quantity by 10. Increases duration of Gold Fever and Gold Finger by 10%.

TETRAFORCE.name: Tetraforce
TETRAFORCE.description: The character starts gaining the chosen stat boost every level.

GUNS_COUNTER.name: Red Muscle
GUNS_COUNTER.description: Fires quickly in four fixed directions.

GUNS2_COUNTER.name: Twice Upon a Time
GUNS2_COUNTER.description: Fires quickly in four fixed directions.

GATTI_COUNTER.name: Flock Destroyer
GATTI_COUNTER.description: Summons capricious projectiles. Might interact with pickups.

SANTAJAVELINCOUNTER.name: Levelin'EEE
SANTAJAVELINCOUNTER.description: Duration affects Amount. Can deal critical damage.

LEFT.name: Metaglio Left
LEFT.description: Channels dark powers to protect the bearer.

RIGHT.name: Metaglio Right
RIGHT.description: Channels dark powers to curse the bearer.

SILVERWIND2.name: Festive Winds
SILVERWIND2.description: Evolved Silver Wind. Weakens enemies defenses.

FOURSEASONS.name: Four Seasons
FOURSEASONS.description: Generates 4 explosions. Amount and Duration affect damage instead.

FOURSEASONS2.name: Godai Shuffle
FOURSEASONS2.description: Evolved Four Seasons. Generates an additional explosion.

SUMMONNIGHT.name: Summon Night
SUMMONNIGHT.description: Generates damaging zones above the character.

SUMMONNIGHT2.name: Night's Reach
SUMMONNIGHT2.description: Evolved Summon Night. Generates damaging zones below the character.

MIRAGEROBE.name: Mirage Robe
MIRAGEROBE.description: Generates freezing mines with a chance to explode.

MIRAGEROBE2.name: J'Odore
MIRAGEROBE2.description: Evolved Mirage Robe. Projectiles move and confuse enemies.

NIGHTSWORD.name: Night Sword
NIGHTSWORD.description: Strikes with a combo attack at the nearest enemy. Retaliates. Might steals hearts.

NIGHTSWORD2.name: Muramasa
NIGHTSWORD2.description: Evolved Night Sword. Enables critical hits and combo finisher. Drains Health.

BUBBLES2.name: Boo Roo Boolle
BUBBLES2.description: Evolved Mille Bolle Blu. Projectiles can hit the same target more than once.

BOCCE.name: 108 Bocce
BOCCE.description: Actually it's just 8. Damages nearby enemies.

SPELL_STRING.name: SpellString
SPELL_STRING.description: Strikes at nearby enemies. Damage multiplied by Speed.

SPELL_STREAM.name: SpellStream
SPELL_STREAM.description: Generates an expanding damaging zone. Damage multiplied by Area.

SPELL_STRIKE.name: SpellStrike
SPELL_STRIKE.description: Strikes at the nearest enemy. Damage further multiplied by Might.

SPELL_STROM.name: SpellStrom
SPELL_STROM.description: Union of SpellString, SpellStream, and SpellStrike. Grows stronger after every singularity.

SWORD.name: Eskizzibur
SWORD.customDescValue: Every fifth activation has a combo finisher.

SWORD2.name: Legionnaire
SWORD2.description: Evolved Eskizzibur. Generates additional projectiles that deal retaliatory damage.

FLASHARROW.name: Flash Arrow
FLASHARROW.description: Can deal critical damage. Amount affects damage instead.

FLASHARROW2.name: Millionaire
FLASHARROW2.description: Evolved Flash Arrow. Fires additional projectiles based on Amount and when picking up gold coins.

PRISMATICMISS.name: Prismatic Missile
PRISMATICMISS.description: Generates explosions around the character. Affected by the first chosen Arcana between II, XIV, or XIX.

PRISMATICMISS2.name: Luminaire
PRISMATICMISS2.description: Evolved Prismatic Missile. Increases the value of gems and coins on the ground.

SHADOWSERVANT.name: Shadow Servant
SHADOWSERVANT.description: Has a chance to slow enemies down.

SHADOWSERVANT2.name: Ophion
SHADOWSERVANT2.description: Evolved Shadow Servant. Has a chance to instantly kill enemies.

ACADEMYBADGE.name: Academy Badge
ACADEMYBADGE.description: Will provide bonus Amount and Revivals in exchange for Growth.

SHADOWSERVANT_COUNTER.name: Silver Sliver
SHADOWSERVANT_COUNTER.description: Counterpart to Shadow Servant and Ophion from Arcana I - Gemini.

PARTY_COUNTER.name: Party Pooper
PARTY_COUNTER.description: Counterpart to Party Popper from Arcana I - Gemini.

C1_REPORT2.name: Emergency Meeting
C1_REPORT2.description: Evolved Reporting Device. Occasionally destroys all enemies of a given type.

C1_SWIPECARD1.name: Card Swipe
C1_SWIPECARD1.description: The amount of attacks is affected by Amount and by low Luck.

C1_SWIPECARD2.name: Wire Fix
C1_SWIPECARD2.description: Evolved Swipe Card. Covers a larger area.

C1_MEDICAL1.name: Medical Scan
C1_MEDICAL1.description: Restores Health points depending on Amount and Recovery.
C1_MEDICAL1.tips: Best with: Amount, Recovery. Area affects other players.

C1_MEDICAL2.name: Paranormal Scan
C1_MEDICAL2.description: Evolved Medical Scan. Grants a random stat boost for the rest of the run.

C1_VENT1.name: Just Vent
C1_VENT1.description: Destroys or heavily damages enemies. Amount affects how many times it can be used.
C1_VENT1.tips: Best with: Amount. Can teleport other players.

C1_VENT2.name: Ejection
C1_VENT2.description: Evolved Just Vent. Draws in all enemies.

C1_GARBA1.name: Clear Debris
C1_GARBA1.description: Generates a damaging zone. Pushes enemies downwards.

C1_GARBA2.name: Clear Asteroids
C1_GARBA2.description: Evolved Clear Debris. Amount affects the number of hit boxes per explosion.

C1_TONGUE1.name: Killer Tongue
C1_TONGUE1.description: Licks enemies in front of you. Damage multiplied by Recovery.

C1_TONGUE2.name: Assassination
C1_TONGUE2.description: Evolved Killer Tongue. Destroys the highest health enemy on screen (and anything along the way).

C1_SAMPLES1.name: Propellant Sampling
C1_SAMPLES1.description: Generates zones that explode when touched by a player. Amount affects the number of hit boxes per explosion.

C1_SAMPLES2.name: Rocket Science
C1_SAMPLES2.description: Evolved Propellant Sampling. Triggers a finisher when the right conditions are met.

C1_HATCOLLECTION1.name: Hats
C1_HATCOLLECTION1.description: Throws cute bouncing projectiles with random properties.

C1_TONGUE1_COUNTER.name: Silver Tongue
C1_TONGUE1_COUNTER.description: Licks enemies behind you. Damage multiplied by Recovery.

C1_SHRINK_CREWMA.name: Shrunk Crewmate
C1_SHRINK_CREWMA.description: Might occasionally shout at nearby enemies.

C1_SHRINK_GHOSTT.name: Shrunk Ghost
C1_SHRINK_GHOSTT.description: Might occasionally freeze enemies in fear.

C1_SHRINK_SHAPES.name: Shrunk Shapeshifter
C1_SHRINK_SHAPES.description: Might occasionally fling leftover body parts at enemies.

C1_SHRINK_SCIENT.name: Shrunk Scientist
C1_SHRINK_SCIENT.description: Might occasionally throw science at enemies.

C1_SHRINK_HORSEE.name: Shrunk Horse
C1_SHRINK_HORSEE.description: Might occasionally infect you with its relentless happiness.

FB_FULLAUTO.name: Full Auto
FB_FULLAUTO.tips: Each Amount will decrease cooldown by 16 milliseconds

FB_PROTOTYPE_A.name: Prototype A
FB_PROTOTYPE_A.tips: Each Amount will decrease cooldown by 16 milliseconds

FB_RAPIDFIRE.name: Rapid Fire
FB_RAPIDFIRE.description: Rapidly fires a stream of projectiles wherever you face.

FB_SPREAD.name: Spread Shot
FB_SPREAD.description: Shoots several projectiles in a wide spread.

FB_PROTOTYPE_C.name: Prototype C
FB_PROTOTYPE_C.description: Shoots several projectiles in a wide spread.

FB_PROTONBEAM.name: FB_PROTONBEAM
FB_PROTONBEAM.description: Throws cute bouncing projectiles with random properties.

FB_SONIC.name: Sonic Bloom
FB_SONIC.description: Fires energy rings wherever you are facing. Rings increase in Area until they hit.
FB_SONIC.tips: Attack weak points for massive damage?

FB_WAVE.name: Wave Beam
FB_WAVE.description: Fires forward when moving, but auto-fires charged shots when stopped.

FB_HOMING.name: Homing
FB_HOMING.description: Fires missiles that home in on enemies.

FB_DIVERMINES.name: Diver Mines
FB_DIVERMINES.description: Shoots exploding mines that follow surfaces.

FB_BLADECROSSBOW.name: Blade Crossbow
FB_BLADECROSSBOW.description: Aims at nearest enemy, has boomerang effect.

FB_PRISMCUTLASS.name: Prism Cutlass
FB_PRISMCUTLASS.description: Attacks horizontally, passes through enemies and may freeze them.

FB_TIMEWARP.name: Time Warp
FB_TIMEWARP.description: Damages and freezes enemies around you.

FB_METALCLAW.name: Metal Claw
FB_METALCLAW.description: Claws nearby enemies. Clawmarks linger and deal damage.

FB_WEAPONPU.name: Weapon Power-Up
FB_WEAPONPU.description: Levels up a random equipped weapon. Gives 1 Revive.
FB_WEAPONPU.tips: Stat bonuses persist if the item is lost.
FB_WEAPONPU.customDescValue: Allows to evolve Contra Force weapons.

FB_PRISMCUTLASS_COUNTER.name: Prism Cutlass
FB_PRISMCUTLASS_COUNTER.description: Attacks horizontally, passes through enemies and may freeze them.

TP_WINDWHIP1.name: Wind Whip
TP_WINDWHIP1.description: Increases curse. Creates damaging zones that slow enemies.

TP_DRAGONWATER1.name: Dragon Water Whip
TP_DRAGONWATER1.description: Generates a string of damaging spheres that target the nearest enemy.

TP_JAVELIN2.name: Long Inus
TP_JAVELIN2.description: Evolved Spear. Fires a constant flurry of spears. Changing horizontal direction triggers a spin attack.

TP_IRONBALL2.name: Wrecking Ball
TP_IRONBALL2.description: Evolved Iron Ball. Powerful damaging ball spins based on movement.

TP_ICE1.name: Ice Fang
TP_ICE1.description: Generates damaging zones in a straight line.

TP_EARTH1.name: Rock Riot
TP_EARTH1.description: Fires projectiles from a fixed location.

TP_EARTH2.name: Gemma Torpor
TP_EARTH2.description: Drops rocks from above. Rocks turn into static damaging crystals.

TP_ELEC2.name: Tenebris Tonitrus
TP_ELEC2.description: Union of Thunder Loop and Tallhammer. Lightning strikes thrice, creates moving spheres of chain lightning.

TP_HOLY1.name: Refectio
TP_HOLY1.description: Damages nearby enemies. Decreases Curse by 5% per Amount.

TP_MACE1.name: Mace
TP_MACE1.description: Swings in a damaging arc that passes through enemies.

TP_MACE2.name: Stamazza
TP_MACE2.description: Evolved Mace. Enemies struck may trigger areas of chain lightning.

TP_SACREDBEASTS1.name: Guardian's Targe
TP_SACREDBEASTS1.description: Fires projectiles when touching enemies, in Retaliation, and when Overhealing by 8+.

TP_SACREDBEASTS2.name: Sacred Beasts Tower Shield
TP_SACREDBEASTS2.description: Evolution of Guardian Targe. Overhealing by 32+ also triggers a period of invulnerability.

TP_ENERGY1.name: Globus
TP_ENERGY1.description: Fires two bouncing projectiles. Duration affected by Amount.

TP_CUSTOS1.description: Summons Cerberus' firey head in faced direction.
TP_CUSTOS1.name: Dextro Custos

TP_CUSTOS2.description: Summons Cerberus' icy head opposite to faced direction. May freeze enemies.
TP_CUSTOS2.name: Sinistro Custos

TP_CUSTOS3.name: Centralis Custos
TP_CUSTOS3.description: Boosts aggressive stats but decreases defensive stats.

TP_CUSTOS4.name: Trinum Custodem
TP_CUSTOS4.description: Union of Dextros, Sinistro, and Arma Custos.

TP_DOMINUS3.name: Dominus Agony
TP_DOMINUS3.customDescValue: Increases total Area, Might, Speed and Duration by %0%.

TP_RAPIDUS1.name: Sonic Dash
TP_RAPIDUS1.description: Increases Move Speed and damages nearby enemies. Area and Speed increase damage.

TP_RAPIDUS2.name: Rapidus Fio
TP_RAPIDUS2.description: Evolved Sonic Dash. Also provides a Shield when firing.

TP_LIGHT1.name: Luminato
TP_LIGHT1.description: Fires orbiting orbs of light in faced direction.

TP_DARK1.name: Umbra
TP_DARK1.description: Fires orbiting orbs of light in faced direction.

TP_MORNINGSTAR.name: Morning Star
TP_MORNINGSTAR.description: Allows you to choose a sub-weapon.

TP_COATOFARMS.name: Coat of Arms
TP_COATOFARMS.description: Allows you to choose a sub-weapon.

TP_SPELLBOOK.name: Belnades Spellbook
TP_SPELLBOOK.description: Allows you to choose a sub-weapon.

TP_SPECTRALSWORD.name: Spectral Sword
TP_SPECTRALSWORD.description: Allows you to choose a sub-weapon.

TP_DIABOLOGUE.name: Ebony Diabologue
TP_DIABOLOGUE.description: Allows you to choose a sub-weapon.

TP_SOULSTEAL_WEAPON.name: Soul Steal
TP_SOULSTEAL_WEAPON.description: Attempts to destroy all enemies and turn them into hearts.

TP_FAMILIARFORGE.name: Familiar Forge
TP_FAMILIARFORGE.description: Allows you to summon a familiar.

TP_ENERGY1_COUNTER.name: Speculo Globus
TP_ENERGY1_COUNTER.description: Fires two bouncing projectiles. Duration affected by Amount.

TP_ICE1_COUNTER.name: Speculo Ice Fang
TP_ICE1_COUNTER.description: Generates damaging zones in a straight line.

TP_EARTH1_COUNTER.name: Speculo Rock Riot
TP_EARTH1_COUNTER.description: Fires projectiles from a fixed location.

TP_HOLY1_COUNTER.name: Speculo Refectio
TP_HOLY1_COUNTER.description: Damages nearby enemies. Decreases Curse by 5% per Amount.

TP_NEUTRON_PICKUP.name: Neutron Bomb
TP_NEUTRON_PICKUP.description: Deals high damage in a large area.

TP_SOULSTEAL_PICKUP.name: Soul Steal
TP_SOULSTEAL_PICKUP.description: Attempts to destroy all enemies and turn them into hearts.

TP_DRACULAHAND.name: Anima of Dracula
TP_DRACULAHAND.tips: You'll be Vlad you have this!

EME_WAVE.name: Emerald Rapture
EME_WAVE.customDescValue: Strikes more often. %0% better chance to leave XP intact.

EME_SELECTOR.name: Inspiration
EME_SELECTOR.description: Allows you to choose a sub-weapon.
